name: NLM Capital Partners
overview: NLM targets profitable businesses with a track record of increasing their intrinsic value over time. We prefer businesses with a sustainable franchise and substantial growth opportunities. Our partners, investment professionals, and advisory board members have many years of successful private equity and senior management experience. Over the last 20 years, this team has committed over $3.5 billion to 157 companies in a variety of industries. NLM primarily invests the personal capital of its limited partners and managers. This approach allows us to take a long-term, value-oriented perspective that permits our portfolio companies to reach their full potential. NLM closed its second fund, NLM Capital Partners II, L.P. in May, 2007 with total commitments of $55,000,000, bringing total capital under management to nearly $100,000,000. At the end of 2008, NLM had over 75% of its new fund available for investment.
